directions.text: Brown ground beef, then add onion and garlic, let cool.
Combine meat, mozzarella, bread crumbs, egg, parsley, salt, and pepper.
Mix spaghetti sauce with tomato sauce, use ¼ of it to cover bottom of a casserole dish.
Stuff cooked shells with the meat mixture and place in rows in the dish.
Cover shells with sauce and sprinkle with parmesan.
